ascend.stats.title: Ascend Stats
ascend.attribute.strength.desc: Increases melee damage, knockback and armor penetration.
ascend.attribute.fortitude.desc: Increases max health and knockback resistance.
ascend.attribute.intelligence.desc: Increases max mana and mana regeneration. Also lowers enchantment cost and buffs potions.
ascend.attribute.willpower.desc: Reduces sanity drain and improves stamina/tempo.
ascend.attribute.charisma.desc: Increases max mana and improves trade deals.
ascend.attribute.magic_scaling.desc: Increases spell power, spell damage, and spell cooldown reduction.
item.ascend.moonseye_tome.desc: A forbidden scripture that reveals knowledge of the Depths. Grants 100 Knowledge on first use, 50 afterwards.
item.ascend.moonseye_tome.used: You gained %s Knowledge from the Moonseye Tome!
